name: Devious Dozen
description:
Devious Dozen is a 12-second game I made for a game jam at my university. The goal is to align the lasers using the mouse, if you manage to do this three times in under 12 seconds you win, if not then you lose. 

Fullscreen is recommended, you can enter fullscreen by clicking the button at the bottom right of the launcher.

Press SPACE to restart

Music by myself 

Sound effects by Kenney.nl
